text: 5:11 Matyu 18:17; Rom 16:17; 2 Tesalonika 3:6; Taitus 3:10; 2 Jon 1:10Kɨ osirizir akar kam, an mɨngarim kamakɨn: Gumazir Kraisɨn adarazir aven iti tam arazir kurabagh amua, gumazamizir uari bakɨava akuir arazim gami, o gumazir igharazibar biziba bagha navim dɨkafi, o marvir guabar ziaba fe, o akar kuraba uari gasir arazim gami, o dɨpar onganiba api, o gumazir igharazibar biziba okei, ia gumazir kam ko ikian markɨ. Egh ia uaghan gumazir kamaghɨn amim ko daghebar aman kogham.
